nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINS AND COASTAL FLOODING IN NORTHEASTERN MEXICO AND TEXAS  LIKELY TO BEGIN LATER TODAY...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINS AND COASTAL FLOODING IN NORTHEASTERN MEXICO AND TEXAS  LIKELY TO BEGIN LATER TODAY...
 As of 1:00 AM CDT Tue Jun 18
 the center of One was located near 21.0, -93.0
 with movement N at 7 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.
